    A class for easily connecting to and using MongoDB

    Nucker

    • Constructor Detail

      • MongoDatabase

        public MongoDatabase(java.lang.String uri)
        Connect to your database
        Parameters:
        uri - The full uri to connect to.
        See Also:
        MongoDatabase#buildURI(String, int) for building a uri without authentication by passing the params, MongoDatabase#buildURI(String, int, String, String) for building a uri with authentication by passing params

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String collectionName,
                 org.bson.conversions.Bson filter,
                 @NotNull
                 java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.Object value)
        Used to easily update data in a collection
        Parameters:
        collectionName - The collection you want to save to
        filter - The filter used to find the document you want to update
        key - The key of the data you want to update
        value - The updated value

      • buildURI

        public static java.lang.String buildURI(java.lang.String host,
                                        int port)
        Used for building uris by just passing params This version does not support authentication
        Parameters:
        host - The host of the database
        port - The port the database is on
        Returns:
        The string of the uri with the params provided

      • buildURI

        public static java.lang.String buildURI(java.lang.String host,
                                        int port,
                                        java.lang.String username,
                                        java.lang.String password)
        Used for building uris by just passing params This version does not support authentication
        Parameters:
        host - The host of the database
        port - The port the database is on
        username - The username of the user your logging into
        password - The password of the user your logging into
        Returns:
        The string of the uri with the params provided
